1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Zaid narrated that :he saw the Prophet performing Wudu, and that he wiped his head with water that was not left over from his hands

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّهُ يَأْخُذُ لِرَأْسِهِ مَاءً جَدِيدًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About One Taking New Water For (Wiping) His Head
